title: electronic control units
extract: An Electronic Control Unit (ECU) is any embedded system in automotive electronics that controls one or more of the electrical systems or subsystems in a vehicle. ... Some modern motor vehicles have up to 80 ECUs.
extract_html: An Electronic Control Unit (ECU) is any embedded system in automotive electronics that controls one or more of the electrical systems or subsystems in a vehicle. ... Some modern motor vehicles have up to 80 ECUs.
